author: EXM7777
text:
there are 2 types of vibe coding and you need to know the difference:

prototyping mode:
- tools like lovable are enough
- get MVPs out in 24-48 hours
- perfect for pitching/demo
- no coding skills required

i've used this to land 6-fig deals with blockchain foundations

building mode:
- production-ready code
- handles thousands of users
- won't crash under pressure
- needs real developers

the mistake is thinking you can do both

prototype yourself to prove the concept, then step back and let developers build something that works

trying to code production apps yourself is like watching your project slowly die
